name: The Shining
author: Stephen King
description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where a sinister presence influences the father into violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from both past and future.

name: It
author: Stephen King
description: In the summer of 1958, a group of kids in a small town face their biggest fears when they square off against an evil clown named Pennywise, whose history of murder and violence dates back for centuries.

name: The Stand
author: Stephen King
description: A deadly virus escapes from a government research facility and wipes out most of humanity, leading the survivors to confront a battle between good and evil.

name: Pet Sematary
author: Stephen King
description: A doctor moves his family to the countryside, only to discover a mysterious burial ground near their new home that has the power to bring the dead back to life.

name: Misery
author: Stephen King
description: A famous author is rescued from a car crash by an obsessed fan, who holds him captive and forces him to write her a new novel.

name: Carrie
author: Stephen King
description: A high school outcast with telekinetic powers seeks revenge on her classmates after they push her too far on prom night.

name: Salem's Lot
author: Stephen King
description: A writer returns to his hometown and discovers that the residents are turning into vampires under the influence of a sinister antique dealer.

name: The Green Mile
author: Stephen King
description: A death row supervisor witnesses supernatural events when a new inmate with mysterious healing powers is brought into the prison.

author: Stephen King
description: A high school teacher discovers a portal that leads to the past and decides to prevent the assassination of John F. Kennedy.

name: The Dark Tower
author: Stephen King
description: A gunslinger embarks on a quest to reach the Dark Tower, a nexus of all universes, and protect it from the evil Man in Black.
